info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 7:47PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Newton, northeastern Hardin, northwestern Orange and southeastern Jasper Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 747 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Evadale, moving west at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lumberton, Silsbee, Mauriceville, Evadale, Lakeview, Weiss Bluff and Gist. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
